item.title: Where Are You Really Going?
item.description:
Where Are You Really Going? by Elder Richard L. Evans, Of the Council of the Twelve given in Sunday Morning of 141st Annual General Conference on Wed Mar 31 1971
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Richard L. Evans, Of the Council of the Twelve

item.title: Should the Commandments Be Rewritten?
item.description:
Should the Commandments Be Rewritten? by Elder Richard L. Evans, Of the Council of the Twelve given in Saturday Afternoon of 141st Semiannual General Conference on Thu Sep 30 1971
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
